plot: Cult film star Tommy Wiseau is abducted by aliens, taken to a weird remote moon base, and forced to play video games.
plot_en: Cult film star Tommy Wiseau is abducted by aliens, taken to a weird remote moon base, and forced to play video games.
plot_es: Cult film star Tommy Wiseau is abducted by aliens, taken to a weird remote moon base, and forced to play video games.
title: The Tommy Wi-Show
